statements.name: PROC GATEWAY
statements.description: The GATEWAY procedure runs code that was written in another language such as Python or R

statements.name: ARGS
statements.description: Specifies a key pair list of arguments that is passed to the Open Source language.

statements.name: OPTS
statements.description: Runs code that was written in another language such as Python or R.

statements.name: SUBMIT
statements.description: Identifies the beginning of a block of Python or R code. Enter Python or R statements between the SUBMIT and ENDSUBMIT statements.

statements.name: ENDSUBMIT
statements.description: Identifies the end of a block of Python or R statements.
